high_descs: Turn left and walk forward and turn right to face the empty roll on the table.
Pick up the empty roll on the table.
Turn around and walk forward to face the toilet paper holder on the wall.
Place the empty roll on the toilet paper holder on the wall.
tasks.task_desc: To put an empty roll on the toilet paper holder on the wall.

high_descs: Turn around, hang a right at the tub and walk to the green dresser on the right.
Pick up the empty roll of toilet paper from the dresser.
Turn around and walk to the black bin on the floor next to the sink.
Put the empty roll on the black metal bar of the holder on the wall to the left.
tasks.task_desc: Place an empty roll of toilet paper on a metal holder.

high_descs: Turn around, go to the counter next to the sink
pick up the toilet paper roll from the counter
Turn around, walk towards the toilet
Put the roll on the toilet paper holder
tasks.task_desc: Retrieve the toilet paper roll from counter, put the roll on the toilet paper holder

high_descs: Go forward then turn right to face the toilet.
Pick up the empty toilet roll off the toilet.
Turn right then left and go forward to the wall.
Put the empty toilet paper roll on the holder.
tasks.task_desc: Put an empty toilet paper roll on a toilet paper holder.

high_descs: walk to face left side of toilet
pick up toilet roll from toilet tank top
walk to face toilet roll holder
put toilet roll on toilet roll holder
tasks.task_desc: put toilet roll on toilet roll holder

high_descs: Go forward to the white toilet.
Grab the empty toilet paper roll on top of the toilet.
Head left towards the black toilet paper holder.
Place the empty toilet paper roll on the holder.
tasks.task_desc: To place an empty toilet paper roll on the toilet paper holder.

high_descs: Turn to the right, head towards the tub, then turn right and walk to the toilet.
Pick up the candle on the far side of the toilet.
Turn around and head to the counter.
Open the bottom right drawer and put the candle in, then shut the drawer.
Turn around and head to the toilet.
Pick up the candle by the soap.
Turn around and head to the counter.
Open the bottom right drawer and put the candle in, then shut the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put the candles on the toilet in the bottom right drawer below the counter.

high_descs: Turn and go to the side of the toilet.  The opposite side of the toilet paper holder.
Grab the candle that is behind the bar of soap off the back of the toilet.
With the candle in hand go to the cabinet with the green drawers.
Put the candle in the second drawer down in the drawer on the right. Shut the drawer.
Turn and go to the toilet on the side opposite of the toilet paper holder.
Pick up the candle that is on the back of the toilet.
With the candle in hand go to the green cabinet.
Put the candle in the second drawer all the way on the right. To the right of the other candle that is in there.
tasks.task_desc: Put candles away in bathroom.

high_descs: Turn to face the white counter-top on your right.
Pick up the candle on the left of the tissue box.
Go to the other end of the counter and turn left to face it again.
Put the candle in a drawer.
Turn around and move to the toilet behind you.
Pick up the candle on the back of the toilet.
Turn back to face the counter again.
Put the candle in the same drawer as the other one.
tasks.task_desc: Put the candles in the bathroom in a drawer.

high_descs: Walk to the green vanity dresser ahead.
Pick up the dirty green towel from the right side of the counter.
Turn around and walk to the sink on the right.
Put the dirty towel inside the sink, rinse it and pick it back up.
Turn right, hang a right at the green vanity dresser and walk to the side of the toilet to the right.
Place the rinsed green towel on the far right corner of the toilet tank.
tasks.task_desc: Place a rinsed towel on a toilet tank.

high_descs: go to the right side of the counter
pick up the green rag from the counter
take the rag to the sink
rinse the rag in the sink then remove
take the rag to the toilet
stand the rag on the back of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: rinse and rag then put it on the back of the toilet

high_descs: Go forward to the dresser.
Take the green rag from the dresser.
Turn around, go forward to the wall to the right of the toilet paper holder, turn right, go forward to the sink.
Wash the rag in the sink then take it out.
Turn right, go forward, when the door is to the left turn right, go forward, turn right to the toilet.
Put the rag on the toilet tank.
tasks.task_desc: Put a washed rag on a toilet tank.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the right side of the green vanity.
Pick up the dirty green towel on the right side of the vanity.
Turn around and walk to the sink on the right.
Put the dirty towel inside the sink, rinse it for a few seconds and pick it back up.
Turn around and take a right to the side of the white toilet.
Put the rinsed towel on the right side of the toilet tank in front of the candle.
tasks.task_desc: Place a rinsed towel on a toilet tank.

high_descs: Turn left and go to the drawer
Grab the rag off of the drawer
Turn around and go to the left of the sink
Wash the rag in the sink and then take it out
Turn around and go to the left of the toilet
Put the rag on top of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: Putting a clean rag on the toilet

high_descs: turn to the left and take a few steps and turn to the left and go to the counter top
take the green rag from the counter top
turn to the left and take few steps and turn to the left and go to the wall and turn to the right and go to the sink
put the green rag in the sink and turn on the water to fill the sink and turn off and drain the water from the sink and pick up the green rag from the sink
turn to the right and take a few steps and turn to the right and take a few steps and turn to the right facing the toilet
put the green ran on top of the toilet tank
tasks.task_desc: Place a washed green rag on top of the toilet tank

high_descs: Turn around and head towards the white counter with green drawers and several bottles on top.
Pick up the bottle with the black cap on the right side.
Turn around and head towards the white toilet.
Place the bottle with the black cap on the top left of the toilet tank to your left.
tasks.task_desc: Place a bottle on top of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn right, then turn to the counter on your right.
Pick up the bottle of lotion to the right.
Turn around and walk to the toilet.
Put the lotion on the back of the toilet next to the toilet paper.
tasks.task_desc: Put the lotion on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: turn to the right, walk and face the counter top with green shelves and yellow spray bottle on top
pick up the pink lotion pumper bottle on the left of the counter top
turn around and face the toilet
put the lotion pumper bottle on the toilet tank top in front of the toilet paper roll already there
tasks.task_desc: put a lotion pumper bottle on the toilet tank

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the bathroom counter in front of the two spray bottles.
Pick up the perfume bottle from the counter.
Turn around and walk to the toilet.
Put the perfume bottle on top of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Move the perfume bottle from the counter to the toilet.

high_descs: Face the opposite direction to go to the countertop behind you.
Get the soap dispenser from the right side of the countertop.
Face the opposite direction and walk to the toilet.
Put the soap dispenser on the toilet tank lid.
tasks.task_desc: Move a soap dispenser to the back of a toilet.

high_descs: turn around, walk to the vanity
grab the purple bottle on the vanity
turn around, walk to the toilet,
put the bottle on the toilet
tasks.task_desc: move the purple bottle from the vanity to the toilet

high_descs: Turn right and walk forward to the middle of the counter then turn left to face it.
Pick up the tissue box closest to the soap dispenser.
Turn around and walk to the toilet.
Put the tissue box on top of the toilet between the candles and soap dispenser.
tasks.task_desc: Put a box of tissues on top of the toilet.

high_descs: move forward and to the right to face the center of the counter
pick up the tissue box that is to the right of the bottle of lotion in the middle of the counter
turn around and move to the toilet
put the box of tissues on the back of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: put a box of tissues on the back of the toilet

high_descs: Make a left to walk towards the countertop.
Pick up the box of tissues closest to the lotion bottles from the countertop.
Turn around and walk towards the toilet.
Set the box of tissues down on the lid of the toilet tank next to the bottle of lotion.
tasks.task_desc: Put a box of tissues on top of the toilet tank.

high_descs: Turn left to walk towards the dresser.
Pick up the box of tissues from the counter.
Turn around to walk across the room to the toilet.
Set the box of tissues down on the lid of the toilet tank.
tasks.task_desc: Move a box of tissues from the dresser to the lid of the toilet tank.

high_descs: turn around and walk over to the near end of the bathroom, then turn left to face the left side of the cabinets there against the wall
grab the box of tissues off of the cabinet
turn right and walk forwards a bit, then right again to end up at the toilet
place the box of tissues on top of the back side of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: place a box of tissues on top of the back side of the toilet

high_descs: Turn around and walk until you're almost to the door then turn right and walk to the white counter.
Pick up the box of tissues that are in front of you.
Turn right and take a step then turn right and walk to the toilet.
Put the box of tissues on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a box of tissues on the toilet.

high_descs: Turn right and go to the bath tub in front.
Take out the dirty green rag from the bath tub.
Turn around and go to the sink on the left.
Remove the rag from the sink after washing it under running water.
Turn left and go to the white and green drawers across the bathroom.
Place the green rag in the bottom drawer underneath the box of tissues
tasks.task_desc: Put the washed rag in the drawer.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the tub.
Pick up the green rag in the tub.
Turn around and veer left to the sink in the corner.
Wash the rag in the sink.
Turn around and walk to the blue cabinets on the wall.
Open the bottom cabinet under the tissue box and place the rag in it.
tasks.task_desc: Place a washed rag in a cabinet.

high_descs: Turn to your right and go straight so that you're facing the bath tub.
Pick up the green rag from the tub.
Bring the rag with you and turn around, cross the room so that you're facing the sink from the left side of it.
Put the rag in the sink and get it wet, then pick it up again.
With the rag in hand, turn around and cross over to the white counter with the blue drawers.
Open the third drawer from the right side of the cabinet and the second one down and put the rag in it, then close it.
tasks.task_desc: put a clean rag away.

high_descs: Go to the end of the counter on your left.
Pick up the dirty green rag on the counter.
Turn around, bring the rag to the sink.
Wash the rag in the sink.
Bring the cleaned rag back to the counter across the room.
Put the rag away in the lower drawer, second from the left.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cleaned rag away in a drawer.

high_descs: walk to face shelf top
pick up green rag from shelf top
walk to face sink
wash and remove rag from sink
walk to face right side of green drawers
put rag in bottom left drawer
tasks.task_desc: put washed rag in bathroom drawer

high_descs: move left to the table
pick up a piece of cloth
turn around to the sink
rinse the cloth in the sink
turn around to the drawer under the table
drop the cloth in the drawer
tasks.task_desc: drop a clean piece of cloth in the drawer

high_descs: Turn left and walk over to the bathroom counter
Pick up the lotion bottle by the tissue box
Turn around and walk up to the side of the toilet
Put the lotion bottle on top of the back of the toilet
Turn around and walk back up to the right side of the bathroom counter
Pick up the lotion bottle from the right side of the counter
Turn around and walk back to the toilet
Put the lotion bottle on top of the toilet behind the other bottle
tasks.task_desc: Put the lotion bottles on top of the toilet

high_descs: Turn and go to the counter top that is to the right of door.
Pick up the second from the wall bottle of lotion.
With the bottle of lotion in hand turn and go to the toilet.  Go to the side of the toilet the opposite of the toilet paper roll on the wall.
Set the lotion on back of the toilet behind the candle.
Go to the counter that is to the right of the door.
Pick up the bottle of lotion that is on the far right of the counter top.
With the lotion in hand turn around and go to the side of the toilet that is the opposite side of where the toilet paper is hanging on the wall.
Place the lotion behind the bottle of lotion that is on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Move bottles of lotion to the back of toilet.

high_descs: move forward to the bath tub
remove the pink bar of soap from the bath tub
turn around and move forward across the bathroom and turn left to move towards the left side of the sink, turn to face the left side of the sink
put the bar of soap in to the sink, turn on the water to rinse off the soap, turn off the water and remove the pink bar of soap from the sink
turn around and move forward and turn to the right at the cabinet with the white counter top and move to the bath tub
put the bar of soap back in to the bath tub

high_descs: move to bath tub
take out a soap from the bath tub
turn around and head to the sink
we the soap in the sink
turn around and head to the tub
place the soap in the tub

high_descs: walk to the tub
grab the pink bar from the tub
turn around walk to the sink
put the bar in the sink, wash it with water, take the bar out
turn right, walk to the vanity, turn right, walk to the tub
put the pink bar in the tub

high_descs: Turn around, go to the sink
Pick up the soap near the sink
Turn left, go forward a bit, turn right, go forward a bit, turn right to face the sink
Put the soap into the sink, open the water, pick up the soap
Turn right, go forward, turn right, go to the bath tub
Put the soap in the bath tub

pick up the soap bar
move to the sink
wet the soap bar
turn left to the bath tub
place the soap in the bath tub

Pick up the bar of soap, to the left of the faucet, on the sink.
Move over to the left side of the sink.
Place the bar of soap in the sink, turn the water on, get the soap wet, turn the water off, and remove the bar of soap from the sink.
Turn to your right and head towards the counter, then make a right and go to the bathroom across from you.
Place the bar of soap in the center of the bath tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a wet bar of soap in the bath tub.

high_descs: move to the toilet to the right of you
pick up soap from the toilet
move to the sink to the right of you
wet the soap in the sink
move to the tub to the left of the toilet
put the soap in the tub

pick up a soap on the toilet
turn right and head for the sink
place the soap in the sink wet it and take it out
turn around and head to the bath tub
place the soap in the tub

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the wall, then turn right and walk up to the toilet.
Pick up the bar of soap off of the toilet tank.
Walk over to the sink.
Put the bar of soap in the sink and turn on the water, after a couple seconds turn the water off and take out the now clean bar of soap.
Turn right and walk towards the dresser, then hang a right and walk up to the tub.
Put the clean bar of soap in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean bar of soap in the tub.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the counter behind you.
Pick up the yellow spray bottle closest to the green rag, on the counter.

Place the yellow spray bottle on the back of the toilet, to the left of the candle.

Pick up the yellow spray bottle that's in front of you.
Turn around and take a step to your left then walk to the toilet.

Pink the spray bottle up from the white counter.
Turn around and face the toilet.
Put the bottle on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn left and move towards the door then turn right and face the center of the vanity.
Pick up the yellow spray bottle to the rear of the green rag from the vanity.
Turn around and move to the left side of the toilet to the left of the sink..
Place the yellow spray bottle between the wall and the candle on the top of the toilet cistern.

high_descs: Take a step to the left and face the long counter with the green drawers
Pick up the yellow spray bottle
Turn around and walk to the side of the toilet
Place the spray bottle on the back of the toilet to the left of the candle

high_descs: Move one step to the left.
Pick up the yellow spray bottle from the counter.
Turn around and walk to the toilet.
Put the spray bottle on the toilet behind the candle.
tasks.task_desc: Put a spray bottle on top of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn left and head towards the door, half way there take a right and stand in front of the long white counter with the green drawers
Pick up the yellow spray bottle on the right; the one right behind the roll of toilet paper
Turn around and walk to the side of the toilet
Place the spray bottle on the back of the toilet behind the candle
tasks.task_desc: Place a spray bottle on the back of a toilet

high_descs: Turn to your left and go to the middle of the counter on your right.
Pick up the yellow spray bottle, behind the toilet paper, on the counter.
Turn around and go to the toilet.
Place the yellow spray bottle on the back of the toilet, to the right of the candle.

high_descs: Move left then back then right again to face the bathroom counter top

Carry the yellow spray bottle to the toilet in the far corner of the room
Place the yellow spray bottle on top of the toilet tank on the far right side
tasks.task_desc: Move a spray bottle to the toilet tank

high_descs: Turn around to face the drawers. Walk towards them and turn to the right and go to the tub.
Pick up the rag that is inside the tub.
Turn around and walk towards the door with the rag. Make a left facing the wall as you walk and then a slight right facing the sink.
Put the rag on the soap in the sink and turn on the water. Turn the water off and take the rag out.
Turn around and walk towards the drawers with the rag. Make a right and head towards the tub.
Toss the rag back into the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Clean the rag to place it back in the tub.

high_descs: Turn around, turn right at the counter, then go straight to the tub.
Pick up the rag from in the tub.
Turn around, go left, then turn right and go to the sink.
Wash the rag in the sink.
Turn around and turn right at the counter, to go to the tub.
Place the rag in the center of the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean rag in the tub.

high_descs: Move to stand in front of the tub.
Pick up the green wash cloth from the tub.
Carry the wash cloth to the sink by the toilet.
Place the wash cloth in the sink and fill the sink with water.
Remove the wash cloth and return to the tub.
Place the wash cloth back in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Place a cleaned wash cloth back in the tub.

high_descs: Turn left, step towards the counter.
Pick up the green dirty washcloth on the counter.
Turn to the left, take a step, turn to the left, walk to the other side of the room, turn to the right, step towards the sink.
Place the dirty washcloth in the sink, turn on the water, turn off the water, pick up the clean washcloth.
Turn to the right, walk to the other side of the room, turn right, walk to the bathtub.
Place the washcloth in the bathtub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean washcloth in the bathtub.

high_descs: Turn left and walk towards short white counter
Pick up the green cloth on the top of the counter
Turn left, then left again and walk towards the toilet. Turn right and face the sink
Place the green cloth in the sink and turn on the faucet. Turn off the faucet and pick up the cloth again.
Turn right and walk towards the short counter, then turn right again and walk towards the bathtub
Place the green cloth inside of the tub

high_descs: Walk one step forward then turn left and walk to the counter in front of you.
Pick up the green cloth to the right side of the counter.
Turn left and walk so you are past the toilet on your left then turn left and walk to the wall then turn right to face the sink.
Place the cloth in the sink and get it wet then retrieve it.
Turn right and walk to the counter then turn right and walk to the tub.
Place the wash cloth in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Place a wet washcloth in the tub.

pick up the dirty green cloth out of the bathtub
walk over to the bathroom sink
wash the cloth in the sink and pick it up again
walk over to the bathtub
place the green cloth in the bathtub

high_descs: Turn around and walk towards the bathtub.
Pick up a green rag from the bathtub.
Turn around and walk to the sink.
Wash the rag in the sink.
Walk back to the bathtub.
Place the rag back in the bathtub.

high_descs: Walk across the room to the bathtub.
Pick the dirty rag out of the bathtub.
Take a right at the toilet and walk to the sink.
Clean the dirty rag in the sink and pick it back up.
Take the clean rag across the room to the bathtub.
Put the cleaned rag back in the bathtub.

pick up soap from the bin
move to the sink to the right
wet the soap in the sink
move to the bin to the left of the sink
put the soap in the bin

high_descs: Turn to your left and go to the garbage can, on the floor, to the right of the sink.
Pull out a bar of soap from the garbage can.
Turn to the sink on your right.
Place the bar of soap in the sink, turn the water on, rinse the sink, turn the water off, and remove the bar of soap from the sink.
Turn back to the garbage can to your right, and beneath you.
Place the bar of soap back into the garbage can on the floor.
tasks.task_desc: Place the bar of soap in the garbage can.

high_descs: Turn left, head to the trash can under the sink.
Pick up the soap in the trash can.
Bring the soap to the sink.
Wet the soap with water in the sink.
Bring the wet soap back to the trash can under the sink.
Put the wet soap in the trash can.
tasks.task_desc: Put wet soap in the trash can.

high_descs: Go forward to the door, turn left, go forward to the sink.
Take the bar of soap from the sink.
Go around to the left side of the sink and face the right wall.
Wash the soap in the sink. Take the soap from the sink.
Turn to the left to face the blue wall.
Put the sink in the black bin below the sink.

high_descs: Move forward turn left and face the sink
Pick up the soap on the right side of the sink
Turn around to your right then move closer on the left side of the sink
Put the soap in the sink and rinse it
Pick up the soap then turn to your left
Drop the soap in the trash bin

high_descs: Walk straight and then veer left to the sink in the corner.
Pick up the soap on the sink near the faucet.
Walk around to the left side of the sink.
Wash the soap in the sink.
Look down at the bin on the floor.
Place the soap in the bin.
tasks.task_desc: Place a rinsed bar of soap in a trash bin.

high_descs: Walk forward to the sink in front of you.
Pick up the bar of soap on the left.
Walk around to the left side of the sink.
Put the bar of soap in the sink, rinse it off, and take it back out.
Turn right and walk forward to the green drawers.
Put the bar of soap in the second bottom drawer from the left, then close the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cleaned bar of soap in a drawer.

Pick up the soap on the left side of the sink
Turn left adjust your position on the right side of the sink
Put the soap in the sink and rinse it
Turn right then head to the cabinet drawers
Open the third lower cabinet drawer on our left put in the soap then close it
tasks.task_desc: Put the clean soap in the cabinet drawer

high_descs: move forwards to the end of the room where the sink is
grab the bar of soap off of the sink there

rinse off the soap inside the sink and pick it back up again
turn right and walk over to the cabinets at the end of the room
place the bar of soap inside the cabinet drawer

turn right to face the bathroom sink properly
place the soap inside the sink, rinse it off, then take it back out
turn right and walk over to the toilet, then hang a left and walk over to the green drawer cabinets on the left side of the room
place the soap inside one of the drawers of the cabinet there

high_descs: Move to the side of the sink where the container is below it.
Take the bar of soap out of the container.
Move around and face the sink.
Rinse the bar of soap off in the sink with water , remove after you turn the water off.

Put the bar of soap in the third drawer from the right end at the bottom of the table.

Turn right to face the sink.
Place the soap in the sink, turn on the water, and then remove once rinsed.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the green vanity with the white counter on the right.

Put the bar of soap inside the sink, rinse it for a few seconds and pick it back up.

Open the bottom drawer under the roll of toilet paper on the vanity, put the rinsed bar of soap inside and close the drawer.

Get the soap wet in the sink and then pick it back up and shut off the water.

Place the soap in the sink, wash it and remove it.
Turn right and walk back to the counter straight ahead.
Place the soap into the counter drawer below.

pick up box of tissues

place tissues on top of toilet

Put the tissue box on top of the back of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: Put the tissue box on the toilet

high_descs: Walk over to the tub
Grab the rag.
Walk over to the sink
Wash the rag
Grab the rag and go to the counter
Place the rag in the drawer
tasks.task_desc: Wash a rag and put it in the drawer

high_descs: Turn around and walk forward, then turn right and walk over to the tub.
Pick up the dirty green rag out of the tub.
Turn right and walk forward, then hang a right and walk towards the door, hang a left and walk over to the sink.
Wash the dirty green rag in the sink until it is clean and then pick it back up.
Walk over to the dresser on the other side of the room.
Open the second lower drawer from the left of the dresser and put the clean green rag inside, then close the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean green rag in a drawer.

high_descs: Turn left until you face the sink, make one step towards the sink, then turn right and make a step towards the bath tub.
Take the green cloth from the bath tub.
Turn around, walk towards the door, then turn left and walk to the brown marble sink.
Put the green cloth in the sink, fill the sink with water, then drain the water and take the cloth.
Turn right, then walk towards the cabinet and open the second bottom drawer from the left.
Put the wet green cloth in the drawer and close it.
tasks.task_desc: Put a wet green cloth in one of the bottom drawers of the bathroom cabinet.

high_descs: Turn left and go around the corner of the counter.
Pick up the green rag on the counter.
Go to the sink.
Rinse the rag in the sink and pick it back up.
Go to the toilet.
Put the green rag on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a rinsed rag on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Step forward and turn right to face the dirty rag on the counter.
Pick up the dirty rag on the counter.
Turn around and cross the room to face the sink.
Wash the rag in the sink and remove it.
Turn left to face the back of the toilet.
Place the clean rag on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: TO clean a rag and place it on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn left and step forward, then turn right and step forward, then turn right again to face the counter.
Pick up the green rag on the counter.
Turn around and move forward to the wall, then turn right to face the sink.
Clean the green rag in the sink.
Go to the toilet behind you.
Place the green rag on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean green rag on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Walk a step ahead, then turn right and walk to the green dresser.
Pick up the toilet paper roll on the dresser.
Turn around and walk to the wall to the left of the sink.
Place the toilet paper roll on the toilet paper holder.
tasks.task_desc: Place a toilet paper roll on a toilet paper holder.

high_descs: Walk forward to the door, then turn right and walk to the counter.
Pick up the empty roll of toilet paper from the counter.
Turn around and walk forward to the empty toilet paper holder by the sink.
Put the empty roll of toilet paper on the toilet paper holder.
tasks.task_desc: Put an empty roll of toilet paper on a toilet paper holder.

high_descs: turn right and face the dresser with the green drawers
pick up the toilet paper roll on the dresser
turn around and walk to the toilet
place the toilet paper roll on the toilet paper fixture
tasks.task_desc: Take an empty toilet paper roll from the dresser and place it on the toilet paper fixture
